name: places/ChIJl48fSAhZwokRie2WK8YaGNw
formattedAddress: 82 E 3rd St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 82 E 3rd St, New York, NY 10003-9215, USA

originalText.text:
Perhaps it was my fault for not clarifying upon using a new wash and fold location but I figured a wash and fold service is a wash and fold service. It appears the whites were not separated because two have pinkish stains on them now and I had new red hand wraps in the laundry bag. All of the whites came back dingy as if they’d been washed with darks. None of the underwear were folded.

I had also originally gone in with some tailoring I wanted done. They don’t have anywhere for you to change into the clothes so they can mark where to tailor the clothing… this was a red flag to me so I did not have it done here.

Service was friendly and clothes smell clean.

originalText.text: Best most reliable wash & fold! Highly recommend. It’s my regular spot.

text.text: Best most reliable wash & fold! Highly recommend. It’s my regular spot.

originalText.text: E3 Cleaners just opened up on my street and I am extremely happy with the service. The wash and fold is reasonably priced, really quick and the customer service is amazing. My clothes consistently come back clean and undamaged, and they even send a text when they are ready for pickup. The man working there was incredibly polite and professional, and I look forward to switching here for my laundry days.

The man working there was incredibly polite and professional, and I look forward to switching here for my laundry days.

originalText.text: E3 is such a great addition to the neighborhood! They are fast with great attention to detail, always offering to go the extra mile with stain removal. I also needed some laundry done with a special detergent and they were very accommodating. I can’t recommend them enough!!

text.text: E3 is such a great addition to the neighborhood! They are fast with great attention to detail, always offering to go the extra mile with stain removal. I also needed some laundry done with a special detergent and they were very accommodating. I can’t recommend them enough!!

originalText.text: I always drop off my dry shirts and laundry here.this is reliable service.
